name: UXfolio Case Study Template
description:
Design your case studies with both the specialized structure of UXfolio and the fluidity of Figma at your disposal.


This template recreates UXfolio’s layouts & customization options so you can experiment with them rapidly in Figma, then easily recreate final designs on uxfol.io for full publication.


By first drafting in Figma, you specifically gain access to the following functionality currently not available on the UXfolio site:

  • Using zoom to get a bird’s eye view of your full case study
  • Placing screencaps of other case studies next to yours for reference
  • An extensive undo history and version control
  • Dragging content sections up and down in real-time to reorganize your document
  • Toggling the visibility of content sections without deleting them
  • Adjusting image fill & cropping within the context of your document


In addition to these Figma features, this template also provides:

  • Text-based placeholders for jotting down image ideas
  • A “Draft” effect to help distinguish draft vs final sections
  • The ability to export adjusted images as final assets for UXfolio
  • A component that lets you cycle through multiple reference case studies next to your draft
  • Tips and walkthroughs to help with Auto Layout and Variant reliant features


Hope you're able to get some use and enjoyment from this template!
